history.proof: intros T f v t H. qsimpl use: LNN,existI,substituteFormula. qsimpl use: LNN,existI,substituteFormula. hauto l: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros T f v t H.
exceptions.tactic: apply existI with (substituteFormula LNN f v t).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System f : Formula v : nat t : Term H : SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t) Unable to unify "fol.Formula LNN" with "fol.Term LNN".

ctx: intros T f v t H.
exceptions.exn: In environment X0 : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L H0 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.existH L v f) T : System f : Formula v : nat t : Term x : fol.Formulas LNN x0 : Prf LNN x (substituteFormula LNN f v t) H : forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g x -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) T g Relations, Functions : Set H1 : Relations -> nat H2 : Functions -> nat Unable to unify "T ?M4184" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNN) (_ : Prf LNN Axm (existH v f)), forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) T g".

original: intros T f v t H. apply existI with (substituteFormula LNN f v t). apply H.
